The flavor/power names is half the fun with this Legacy card. Stealth: Stealth and Blades/Claws/Fangs? What am I, an Indy figure? Phasing/Teleport: If you're seeing this power, I'm basically a tie-up figure. Blades/Claws/Fangs: I'll cut you with my...two guns?!? Regeneration: C'mon regen... poppa needs that sweet, sweet 9 attack value Perplex: Who do I have to talk to about perplexing my own damage?
